item.title: ETHEUR MACD trading statistics
item.description:
For every 1 year span of MACD trading on the ETHEUR market, how many simulations:

  • beat the market?
  • make a profit?

item.title: ETHEUR MACD Trading Simulation
item.description: This scrollable graph is generating live simulations of MACD trading. The initial balance is 100 (fiat) and the trading fees are 0.26% per trade.

item.title: OHLC MACD chart
item.description:
OHLC chart and MACD indicator for ETHEUR 1day Kraken market data.

See the demo hosted on Firebase.

item.title: Projects
item.description: ReactJS rewriting of create-react-app using Webpack. sources | demo QR code readers sources (including React, Angular versions) Pure Javascript version : demo Webpack version : demo “Knockout.JS like” binding sources | demo Client side PDF generation and download sources | demo Présentation Niort Numérique Smart-City IOTA slides

item.title: About
item.description: This is my personal blog providing details about the projects on https://github.com/avergnaud Loading repositories... Language repositories var mapper = function(ent){return ent.language}, reducer = function(stats, lang) {stats[lang] = (stats[lang] || 0) + 1; return stats}; window.ghApiCallHandler = function(result) { if (Math.floor(result.meta.status/100) == 2) { langStats = result.data.map(mapper).reduce(reducer, {}); var sortable = []; for (var language in langStats) { sortable.push([language, langStats[language]]); } sortable.sort(function(a, b) { return b[1] - a[1]; }); var table = document.

item.title: Market Cap Treemap
item.description: And 24h performance for 10 biggest cryptocurrencies. This project uses the CoinMarketCap API.

item.title: ThreadLocal study
item.description: I have read this great article about java ThreadLocal objects and wanted to test their behaviour.
